ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Mesmerisation
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll definately do that. :)  It might have been the hilly terrain I was on interferring with the distance factor. We ve been breaking the spawn in the preacher
ygData.messageBody:
I'll definately do that. :) It might have been the hilly terrain I was on
interferring with the distance factor.
We've been breaking the spawn in the preacher room good enough that the
preacher (when and if he spawns) is usually up there alone when he spawns.
It's the fun pulls from back stage, and the other rooms around us that
sometimes get a little big. :) I suppose I could back up toward the stage
a bit for those though.. I'll play with it a bit more and see how it
goes. :)

Thanks for the help!! :)

Ezrae Dreamstealer
Lvl 23 DE Enchantress
Brell Serilis

On Mon, 20 Mar 2000, Farr, Robert wrote:

.From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
.
.It has quite a long range. Not sure why you're having such trouble with it.
.I know for a fact that you should be able to hit the preacher with it from
.where the hallway enters his room. Keep playing with it. I know you'll be
.happy with the results.
.
.> -----Original Message-----
.> From: Jenni [SMTP:freya@...]
.> Sent: Monday, March 20, 2000 4:06 PM
.> To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
.> Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Mesmerisation
.>
.> From: Jenni <freya@...>
.>
.> Really? If I try to stay back a bit I get the target too far away
.> message. It seems like I have to be right in on the action to make it
.> work. Anyone know what the actual range for it is? (I was testing it in
.> lake rathe on Aviak Guards, was also hilly where I was if that's a
.> factor..)
.> I'm currently fighting mainly in the Preacher room in Perma. (woohoo runed
.> circlets :) ) The room is pretty small. I don't know how much distance I
.> can get with it in there. Color Shift/Flux has come in handy in there
.> though. :)
.>
.> -Ezrae Dreamstealer
.> Lvl 23 DE Enchantress
.> Brell Serilis
.>
.> On Mon, 20 Mar 2000, Farr, Robert wrote:
.>
.> .From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
.> .
.> .In the countless hours that I have spent in the Avatar of Fear room in
.> Cazic
.> .Thule, this is the single most used spell. The trick is not to be
.> standing
.> .close to the critter that you have targetted. I think once you start
.> using
.> .it from a distance you'll start liking it a LOT more.
.> .
.> .Qinie Isil'Goren
.> .34 Enchanter
.> .
.> .> -----Original Message-----
.> .> From: Jenni [SMTP:freya@...]
.> .> Sent: Monday, March 20, 2000 3:47 PM
.> .> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
.> .> Subject: [eqenchanters] Mesmerisation
.> .>
.> .> From: Jenni <freya@...>
.> .>
.> .> Hi All!
.> .>
.> .> Just how useful is the Mesmerisation spell for you guys? I've found
.> that
.> .> even with bad pulls I've been able to control things with Enthrall and
.> .> Charm (been spending a lot of time in permafrost lately). When I use
.> .> Mesmerisation I get mezzed too, makes me pretty useless to my group
.> when
.> .> this happens (especially when I scream cancel magic and they don't
.> .> listen). It helps with the mana involved in large pulls, but is it
.> really
.> .> worth it to use?
.> .>
.> .> -Ezrae Dreamstealer
.> .> Lvl 23 DE Enchantress
.> .> Brell Serilis
.> .>
.> .>
